00027 /*
00028  * lustre/llite/xattr_security.c
00029  * Handler for storing security labels as extended attributes.
00030  */
00031 
00032 
00033 #include <linux/security.h>
00034 #include <linux/selinux.h>
00035 #include <linux/xattr.h>
00036 #include "llite_internal.h"
00037 
00038 #ifdef HAVE_SECURITY_IINITSEC_CALLBACK
00039 
00051 static int
00052 ll_initxattrs(struct inode *inode, const struct xattr *xattr_array,
00053               void *fs_info)
00054 {
00055         const struct xattr *xattr;
00056         struct dentry *dentry = fs_info;
00057         size_t name_len;
00058         char *full_name;
00059         int err = 0;
00060 
00061         for (xattr = xattr_array; xattr->name != NULL; xattr++) {
00062                 name_len = strlen(XATTR_SECURITY_PREFIX) + strlen(xattr->name)
00063                            + 1;
00064                 OBD_ALLOC(full_name, name_len);
00065                 if (full_name == NULL)
00066                         return -ENOMEM;
00067                 strlcpy(full_name, XATTR_SECURITY_PREFIX, name_len);
00068                 strlcat(full_name, xattr->name, name_len);
00069 
00070                 err = ll_setxattr(dentry, full_name, xattr->value,
00071                                   xattr->value_len, 0);
00072 
00073                 OBD_FREE(full_name, name_len);
00074 
00075                 if (err < 0)
00076                         break;
00077         }
00078         return err;
00079 }
00080 
00091 int
00092 ll_init_security(struct dentry *dentry, struct inode *inode, struct inode *dir)
00093 {
00094         if (!selinux_is_enabled())
00095                 return 0;
00096 
00097         return ll_security_inode_init_security(inode, dir, NULL, NULL, 0,
00098                                                &ll_initxattrs, dentry);
00099 }
00100 #else /* !HAVE_SECURITY_IINITSEC_CALLBACK */
00101 
00111 int
00112 ll_init_security(struct dentry *dentry, struct inode *inode, struct inode *dir)
00113 {
00114         int err;
00115         size_t len, name_len;
00116         void *value;
00117         char *name, *full_name;
00118 
00119         if (!selinux_is_enabled())
00120                 return 0;
00121 
00122         err = ll_security_inode_init_security(inode, dir, &name, &value, &len,
00123                                               NULL, dentry);
00124         if (err != 0) {
00125                 if (err == -EOPNOTSUPP)
00126                         return 0;
00127                 return err;
00128         }
00129 
00130         name_len = strlen(XATTR_SECURITY_PREFIX) + strlen(name) + 1;
00131         OBD_ALLOC(full_name, name_len);
00132         if (full_name == NULL)
00133                 GOTO(out_free, err = -ENOMEM);
00134         strlcpy(full_name, XATTR_SECURITY_PREFIX, name_len);
00135         strlcat(full_name, name, name_len);
00136 
00137         err = ll_setxattr(dentry, full_name, value, len, 0);
00138         OBD_FREE(full_name, name_len);
00139 
00140 out_free:
00141         kfree(name);
00142         kfree(value);
00143 
00144         return err;
00145 }
00146 #endif /* HAVE_SECURITY_IINITSEC_CALLBACK */
